This is episode 22 of the one bedroom series (see link below for all episodes). In this video, I went through the steps on how to modify and property detail sectional elevation views, in AutoCAD Architecture 2020 or 2021.

I hope that you learn a thing or 3. Do me a flavour - try one of the below...
